Text: Please do your part and seed after completion! I can't support this forever! Also, let me know if anybody would like to see more FLAC content, I have 5 more DVD+R's of albums, lots of Drum & Bass.

A good rip but you didn't use the correct read offset which is +48 from here: http://www.accuraterip.com/driveoffsets.htm

There used to be a guide readily available that showed you how to make perfect rips but the link's down: http://calonet.org/eac

Thanks and will be uploading more of her albums?

This is the only one of her albums I have; sorry...

Also, I found out about the correct read offset later on... but I've since switched to Linux, and now I use K3b for ripping... does anyone know how to do read offsets in any application in Linux?
